org.apache.ambari.server.state

Enum State

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<State>
      • org.apache.ambari.server.state.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<State>

    public enum State
extends Enum<State>

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DISABLED
      Disabled master's backup state
      INIT
      Initial/Clean state.
      INSTALL_FAILED
      Install failed.
      INSTALLED
      State when install completed successfully.
      INSTALLING
      In the process of installing.
      STARTED
      State when start completed successfully.
      STARTING
      In the process of starting.
      STOPPING
      In the process of stopping.
      UNINSTALLED
      State when uninstall completed successfully.
      UNINSTALLING
      In the process of uninstalling.
      UNKNOWN
      State could not be determined.
      UPGRADING
      In the process of upgrading the host component deployed bits.
      WIPING_OUT
      In the process of wiping out the install.

      • isValidStateTransition

        public static boolean isValidStateTransition(State startState,
                                             State desiredState)
        Utility method to determine whether or not a valid transition can be made from the given states.
        Parameters:
        startState - the starting state
        desiredState - the desired state
        Returns:
        true iff a valid transition can be made from the starting state to the desired state

      • isValidDesiredStateTransition

        public static boolean isValidDesiredStateTransition(State startState,
                                                    State desiredState)
        Utility method to determine whether or not the given desired state is valid for the given starting state.
        Parameters:
        startState - the starting state
        desiredState - the desired state
        Returns:
        true iff the given desired state is valid for the given starting state

      • checkUpdateConfiguration

        public static void checkUpdateConfiguration(ServiceComponentHost serviceComponentHost,
                                            State currentState,
                                            State desiredState)
                                     throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Determine whether or not it is safe to update the configuration of the given service component host for the given states.
        Parameters:
        serviceComponentHost - the service component host
        currentState - the current state
        desiredState - the desired state
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if the changing of configuration is not supported
